content.title: The IPC & IPF
content.body:
The Intergalactic Prison Complex is owned and operated by the Intergalactic Protection Force - known for how the higher-ups will abuse their power (and pay off anyone necessary) to ensure their domination of policing the system.
I experienced that firsthand during my stay there, and am more than happy to have escaped. So many aren't able to...
But, I managed to make it out alive. Now, I must do my best to avoid them for as long as possible.
IPF guards arenâ€™t exactly known for being friendly, after all. I have to constantly watch my back for fear of getting surprised by one of them - even on a remote world like this.
